nodes.text: The 27th Elite Recon was a unit in the Imperial Army.
Troopers in the 27th Elite Recon had use of speeder bikes and AT-STs, typically painted in forest camouflage patterns, though scout troopers in the unit still wore the standard white scout armor.
When compared to the 39th Recon, the speeder bike detachments were more accurate in combat. Their AT-ST units were known to be less accurate but used more powerful weapons.
